question: First William College was set up for which among the following purpose?
option1: To Provide Muslim Law related education
option2: To provide education on Hindu Law and Philosophy
option3: To train the Civil Servant of the Company
answer: To train the Civil Servant of the Company
explanation: In the year 1800, the Fort William College was set up by Lord Wellesley. Its main purpose was to provide training related education to the Civil Servant of the Company.
